name: Toucho Nacho
description:
The sweet and salty snacks lived in harmony, each in their own realm. However, in the sweet lands a evil piece of chocolate emerged, longing for world domination and enslaving all the salty snacks! His dark matter has turned the sweet snacks evil.

You and your Nacho friend set out on a journey to defeat the evil chocolate emperor and restore peace in the salty and sweet realm. You have to work together with your unique skills to solve puzzles and get to the chocolate king. Platform your way through the different levels, collect hidden collectibles or dip yourself in some hot salsa! Most important thing is, that you always stay together! Nachos are not meant to be alone for a long time.

This was our first semester group project and was developed in around 4 months. (There might be some small collider issues). We still hope you have fun and enjoy our little game!

We highly recommend to play the game with a gamepad! You can also play the game over Parsec.

The game will safe your progress. If you wish to delete your progress you can find the safe file at: C\User\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\TouchoNacho.
